amendment.description: To allow the IRA rollover of amounts received in airline carrier bankruptcy.

vote.text: Amendment SA 46 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 46 proposed by Senator Rockefeller for Senator Cantwell. (consideration: CR S830-833) To allow the IRA rollover of amounts received in airline carrier bankruptcy.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 46 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 46 proposed by Senator Rockefeller for Senator Cantwell.
